page.description: Get the length of the file in bytes.
page.discussion: The .BYTES_GET() method returns the number of bytes in a file referenced by the object pointer.

section.title: Example
section.description: This script returns the size (in bytes) of the selected file.
section.example: filename = ui_get_file("Choose File", "Text File(*.txt)", "C:\a5\default.txt", "X") file_pointer = file.open(filename, FILE_RO_SHARED) bytes = file_pointer.bytes_get() trace.writeln("Bytes:" + str(bytes)) file_pointer.close()
